RWD.automation_tool: Name or description of the automation tool

systems_involved.system_id: Identifier for the system involved in the process
systems_involved.path: Path or location related to the system

system_interactions.action_name: Name of the action performed on the system
system_interactions.action_type: Type or category of the action
system_interactions.interaction_element_type: Type of element involved in the interaction

ui_locators.locator_type: Type of locator used in the UI interaction
ui_locators.locator_value: Value or identifier for the locator in the UI
